definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: Several members , refusing to accept the decision of the vote , got up and stormed out .
sentences.chinese: 几个成员拒绝接受表决的结果，愤然而起，猛冲出去。

sentences.english: He careened through foreign territories on a desperate kind of blitz.
sentences.chinese: 在孤注一掷地闪电战中他猛冲过外国领地。

sentences.english: The birds exploded into the air, all pipes and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鸟群猛冲上天，鸣叫响成一片，羽毛纷纷飘落。

sentences.english: As a cavalryman, his style was hard-driving and aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名天生的骑兵，他的风格就是猛冲狠斗。

sentences.english: They rushed the guard at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 他们向大门口的卫兵猛冲过去。

sentences.english: Over the heads of the bathers dashed the immense wave.
sentences.chinese: 那巨浪猛冲过来，越过那些泳者的头顶。

sentences.english: Bicycles and motorbikes careened in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 自行车和摩托车在我面前猛冲直撞地行驶。

sentences.english: The horses dashed out of burning stable.
sentences.chinese: 马群猛冲出着了火的马厩。

sentences.english: The race started. the rabbit darted almost out of sight at once.
sentences.chinese: 比赛开始了，免子猛冲出去，简直一转眼就不见了。

sentences.english: He dashed to smash the fashionable ashtray with cash.
sentences.chinese: 他猛冲用现金砸那个过时的烟灰盘。

sentences.english: Head flung back as if to howl, the monkey merely yawns.
sentences.chinese: 头猛冲后背好像号叫，一只猴子仅仅打哈欠。

sentences.english: They threw themselves at the men and tried to bite them.
sentences.chinese: 它们朝人猛冲了过去，企图咬他们。

sentences.english: The car walloped the pavement, charging towards the Holland Tunnel .
sentences.chinese: 汽车猛冲过马路，直奔荷兰地道。

sentences.english: They've never sprinted headlong into a flock of seagulls to watch them flap and scatter.
sentences.chinese: 他们也不曾猛冲入海鸥群中，看着它们振翅四散。

sentences.english: As soon as the bull saw the horses, he began to charge again.
sentences.chinese: 公牛一见到马又开始猛冲起来。

sentences.english: Several protesters storm out in disgust, shouting insults.
sentences.chinese: 几个抗议者厌恶地猛冲而走，还喊着侮辱人的话。

definition: to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
to collide/jerking motion/to impinge/to offend/to provoke
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
